website_summaries.verdict: Low price point for a shoe that is built to last for an entire season from a trusted brand name.
pros: Three different colors and styles available
Shoe fits high on the ankle for plenty of support
Cleat layout yields good traction on multiple playing surfaces
Shoe's materials almost seem to adhere to your foot
cons: Some players won't like the high ankle support

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Wide Foot
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality cleat that fits my sons wide foot. Like the ankle stability but dang these things are hard to lace up tight. Lol. I will update my post after football season to see how they hold up to his rigorous football practices and games.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: the high top part is pretty narrow. When lacing the cleats to the top
customer_reviews.text: Discovered from other reviews that one size up would be the appropriate fit. It was! Though, the high top part is pretty narrow. When lacing the cleats to the top, the tongue isn't quite wide enough to cover the top of the ankle. As for appearance, the arch is actually white on the outer part of the shoe. Wasn't expecting that from the pic online, but it looks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cabell

customer_reviews.title: Great show, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: They are hard for my son to put on himself but I expected that. I ordered larger than i needed because his feet grow fast. They seem to be comfortable. The company shipped them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My son really likes them.
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes them. Added bonus, I can look for the kid with one black shoe and one white one to identify my son. This is what they look like from either side.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Cathey

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, good quality and durable shoes to last the season and longer
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: There not hard to put in at all! They lace all the way up the ankle, for great ankle support. Nephew loves them
customer_reviews.author: CandyButts

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A JOKE.
customer_reviews.text: Too small, tried to return, they were going to charge $25 for the return! That's almost what these cleats cost me! So Irritated! Never had a problem with returns until ordering from Under Armour! Make sure you don't need to do an exchange or return! NEVERRRR AGAINNN!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: ... cleats but he loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son goes up a size in Under Armour cleats but he loves them and says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes for football season! And they were great for the extra ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Easy to clean and comfortable to wear. I’ll likely buy the same brand in a larger size for next season.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great football shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lots of lacing to do at first—as expected— but gets easier over time as they wear in; great fit and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Warrington

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: These look great and my son loves the way they fit. He likes that he can wear what looks like what the professionals wear.
customer_reviews.author: RyKy56

customer_reviews.title: Cool football shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fit as advertised . They were perfect for my son during football and they looked cool.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter using these cleats for lacrosse and she loves them. They are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my son's 2nd year of youth football. They look great and seem to be really comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves them. I ordered big according to reviews and the fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Pdx gal

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wears these for pee wee football. He says they are comfortable. Kind of pain to get the tongue under the sides when putting them and lacing them up.
customer_reviews.author: David Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the shoe is only attached at the bottom. So it slide all over
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats, but very hard to get into
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleats, but very hard to get into! You have to literally pull the shoe laces off to get them on! My grandson has a little wider foot, hoping they stretch out more as he wears them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything met my expectation but the season hasn't started so ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything met my expectation but the season hasn't started so mot not sure how the move on cuts. More to come after they het used
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is soooooo comfy, my son says. He says it's light and makes him run faster. Perfect ! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JerryLovesLisa

customer_reviews.title: He said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 8 yr old son and he loves them. He said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tifanie pappas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look great, confortable and protect well my son's ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Customer opinion

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable n great ankle and arch support
customer_reviews.text: My son had problems playing football last year. He developed plantar fasciitis. I bought him these this year for support along with leg sleeves and compressed sock. he has been almost pain free. before they came he was in so much pain. he would cry. Now he is doing so well. he isn't wearing any special sock. just the high tops n leg sleeves. I would recommend these shoes. he says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good looking cleat. They seem to Run about a half size too small. Having to exchange for bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bryant

customer_reviews.title: size matters!!
customer_reviews.text: If they fit like a normal shoe I would have rated them 5 Stars! Get a 1/2 size larger than normal shoe size for your children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They provide his ankles with added support and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son feels like Cam Newton wearing these. You can't tell him that he is not!
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: who plays football and he love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandson, who plays football and he love them
customer_reviews.author: Varretta Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Fit good
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these! A little hard to get on-have to use your patience. My son is very happy after that.
customer_reviews.author: Hairxpert

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoes, difficult to get on without taking laces out, my eight year old needs help, but shoe fits well, and supports ankle very well!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Russo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with these cleats and wants to keep getting them as he grows
customer_reviews.author: scott keaten

customer_reviews.title: He says that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. He says that they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Imsal3

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect. The material was made perfect. It helped my son during football keeping his ankles protected. Product came quick and was great.
customer_reviews.author: Heather chaney

customer_reviews.title: He said they were pretty comfortable as cleats go
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. He said they were pretty comfortable as cleats go. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: She-She

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and helps him with traction with the high ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats perfect for my son and they look great too.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Overall good cleats!
customer_reviews.text: My only issue was that they run small so I re ordered 1/2sz larger n they still seem too close to sz so maybe consider full sz up but the cleats are great, my son really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: ROC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats. I got this brand for 3 of my boys. The are very durable and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My son says they are comfortable. They are hard to lace up.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are great! They fit as described. Tight in the ankle and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son is pleased with his first pair of football shoes... thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Nacapuy

customer_reviews.title: you are better off with a Nike football shoe
customer_reviews.text: the tongue of the shoe is AWEFUL my son has to constantly alter it. its a wasteful product. you are better off with a Nike football shoe. the tongue of the shoe always out on the sides of the shoe string lace of the shoe, and my sons have narrow feet...
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but great football shoe
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and myself loved the shoe, but they run small. I had to return and move him into a men's 7. He is 10 years old and normally wears a 6 in UA and Nike. Others in a great shoe. He loves the 7, says he is able to run and cut well.
customer_reviews.author: TJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only been a week of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Cleats are just as they were listed. Its my own fault. I ordered the wrong size. Overall, They are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: sierra paschall

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sneaker they were a little tight for my fat foot son
customer_reviews.author: Amander Lee

customer_reviews.title: He says the shoes are very comfortable and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays football in these shoes. He says the shoes are very comfortable and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Bearcat

customer_reviews.title: said that his new Under Armour cleats look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son, who has been playing football for the last 6 years, said that his new Under Armour cleats look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Highlight Rm Jr Black/White Football Shoes
product_meta.description: UPPER: UA ClutchFit. Slip on the shoe, pull your laces and feel the UA ClutchFit upper wrap your foot in a “second skin” of advantages / Our latest lightweight material innovation forms to the contours of your foot, amping your joints and muscles and giving you better fell, fit, and support / Eyerow cut-out for better ease of entry and superior flexibility. FOOTBED: Die-cut EVA provides excellent comfort and stability. OUTSOLE: Rubber molded outsole provides aggressive traction on all surfaces with a lightweight, comfortable feel.
feature_bullets: Under Armour Highlight Rm Jr Black/White Football Shoes 2.5
